queries.name: query1
queries.query: max:kubernetes_state.deployment.replicas{cluster-name:production* AND namespace:handshake AND deployment IN (handshake-brave-mayfly-pgbouncer,handshake-active-sponge-pgbouncer,handshake-mighty-shrew-pgbouncer)} by {cluster-name,deployment}

queries.name: query1
queries.query: sum:pgbouncer.pools.cl_active{cluster-name:production AND kube_namespace:handshake AND kube_deployment IN (handshake-mighty-shrew-pgbouncer,handshake-brave-mayfly-pgbouncer,handshake-active-sponge-pgbouncer)} by {kube_deployment}
